attributes.action: pass an act of parliament, that places a greater emphisis on the BBC, and other broacasting institutions to reduce the number of reality/celebrity t.v shows they produce, and increase the number of documentaries and educational programmes they produce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain, request the Prime Minister Gordon Brown, to pass an Act of Parliament, that places a greater emphisis on broadcasters to reduce the number of celebrity/reality t.v shows, and instead replace these with documentaries and educational programmes, which will serve a greater benefit to the British People, by promoting morality, empathy, and knowledge.
